page.title: 06POOL&LEISURE CENTRE KLMARNCK
page.content: EACH WEEK 20 GROUPS OF PUPILS ARE TIME TABLED TO VISIT THE BATHS FROM LOCAL PRIMARY SCHOOLS.THEY ATTEND ONCE A WEEK FOR 10 WEEKS WHEN THEY ARE GIVEN INSTRUCTION ON LEARNING TO SWIM OR IMPROVING THEIR TECHNIQUE.AT THE END OF THE 10 WEEKS MOST GAIN A BADGE SHOWING THE STANDARD THEY HAVE REACHED.SWIMMING LESSONS FOR ADULTS ARE ALSO POPULAR AS IS THE LATE NIGHT SESSIONS,NOT OPEN TO THE PUBLIC,FOR CLUB SWIMMING AND SUB_AQUA CLUB USE. THE LEISURE CENTRE IS ADJACENT TO THE SWIMMING POOL AND PAYMENT IS MADE AT THE SAME KIOSK;CHANGING FACILITIES AND SHOWERS ARE THE SAME AS FOR THE BATHERS.BECAUSE OF ITS CONSTRUTION _ BRICK WALLS AND A CANVAS ROOF SUPPORTED BY THE PRESSURE OF AIR THE BUILDING IS OFTEN REFERRED TO AS "THE BUBBLE" CONTD.
